instructions: # Fate Core Character Sheet.## Based on previous Fate Core Sheet by Andrew Bailey (krathognis) and Devindra Payment (@Ardnived)##**If you use this sheet instead of the old one there will be no data lost****however**, you'll have to do some by hand copy paste from Attributes & Abilities fields : **Stunts** and **Extras** to the new ones area on the sheet.The usage of the roll buttons of that sheet in the macro quick bar is not working and is not fixable.
